prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a sleek body and a long tail, swimming gracefully in the ocean.
Imagine a cute dragon-type creature with blue scales and fins, living in coral reefs.
Generate a unique aquatic Pokemon with a charming face and delicate features that resemble a seahorse.
Design a small water-type Pokemon that has a playful personality and loves to splash water everywhere.
Show me a Pokemon that has a serpentine body and a friendly demeanor, perfect for underwater adventures.
Make a whimsical water-type creature that has a rounded snout and large fins, suitable for a tropical habitat.
Give me a Pokemon with a charming smile and fluid movements that can be found in serene lakes.

distinctive_features: Fins on the side resembling wings
